name: __MSG_iField beta__
description: __MSG_An on/offline fieldlinguistics database app which adapts to its user's I-Language.__
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://docs.google.com/ https://ifield.fieldlinguist.com/  https://si0.twimg.com https://ssl.google-analytics.com/ https://www.youtube.com/ ; script-src 'self' https://ssl.google-analytics.com/ ; connect-src  https://www.youtube.com/  https://ifield.fieldlinguist.com/  https://ilanguage.iriscouch.com/ https://ilanguage.iriscouch.com:443/ 'self'; object-src 'self';
